text: The Vancouver Giants are a Canadian ice hockey team. They began playing in 2001. The team currently plays in the Western Hockey League. They play their home games in Vancouver, British Columbia at the Pacific Coliseum. The owners of the Giants are businessmen Ron Toigo and Sultan Thiara, Hockey Hall of Fame members Gordie Howe, Pat Quinn, and singer and actor Michael Bubl√©. The have won 1 Memorial Cup in 2007 and a Ed Chynoweth Cup in 2006. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2001 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in British Columbia Category:Western Hockey League Category:Sports teams in Vancouver
title: Vancouver Giants
